name: Chased by Realilty
description:
This is the story of a guy called Markus. He's living his day to day life just fine.

Until the sound of a breaking plate wakes him up in the middle of the night.

Scares and death await him, will he survive ?

---

That was fun to write lol, this is my first game ever, I used RPG Maker MV, and from learning the engine (as easy as it is considering the lack of required programming) to playtesting, it took me about 21 hours. It's about 10 minutes long, not exactly difficult, and probably has a few hopefully not game breaking bugs.

Have fun, and be sure to tell me how much of a stupid game it is :)
